reviews.customers_say: Customers love the dress's style, particularly its halter design with a choker collar, and appreciate its comfortable fit, with one noting it's ideal for bigger busts. The material receives positive feedback for its quality and appearance, and customers like the adjustable zipper on the side slit. They find it good value for money, especially for budget-conscious customers, and appreciate its stretchiness, with one mentioning it accommodates all body curves. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for wedding guest dress
items.body: Gorgeous and so comfortable! Material is the perfect amount of stretchy and snug and it hugs all the right places. I love the adjustable slit, so it can be as modest as you desire. Great quality for the price! You cannot go wrong for any event! Read more
items.author: KandMTek

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth it!
items.body: This dress is amazing! So comfortable and the material looks much nicer than the price suggests. Very elegant and was happy with the length, as sometimes I have trouble finding something long enough. Read more
items.author: Claire

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning!
items.body: I got a 3x as a 3x girly. It fits amazing, and makes my curves look insane. I absolutely love the adjustable slit. I'd say it's pretty noticeable that it's a zipper, not my favorite look but doesn't bother me too much. The quality of fabric was surprising for the price. It was thick and soft, I didn't see any fraying or threads coming out. The zipper in the back feels nice, by myself I can get it on pretty well. The color is a bit darker than I was expecting but I still absolutely love the color. Read more
items.author: Crystal Pierson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: Beautiful dress . Material is great quality. Very stretchy and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars High quality especially for the price!
items.body: Super great a great value! This dress was comfortable and elegant. The liner kept any undergarment colors from being visible. The thigh slit could be adjusted in length by a discreet zipper. My only complaint was that the neckline under the lace halter came up very high, and there was nothing built in to keep the girls on top. So I had to constantly make sure to pull boobs up/dress down. This may have been caused by the strapless bra I wore. So I'll try again without it and see how it does. But with no built in support, if your big chested you will need to consider your bra well. But overall, loved the look, just wish I had trialed bra-less or another strapless bra, or that it had some support built in. For reference I am 5'7, 180lbs, size 12 and a large fit perfectly, with 2" heels the length was perfect. Read more
items.author: William

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Navy velvet dress to die for!
items.body: Love this dress! Made me feel sexy in alll the right ways. Had people asking me all about it at my sisters wedding this weekend. It is a darker navy which I loved and the velvet was amazing. Such a great quality dress! Iâ€™m 5â€™4 and the length was perfect for me with 2-3in heels Read more
items.author: Adrianna

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 100% Recommend
items.body: Fits as expected. Iâ€™m 155, 5â€™5, 38 D. I got a M. Could have probably done a S cause there is a tiny bit of space in the back but for my chest this was a good fit. Absolutely love the zipper slit. Wore it all the way zipped for a wedding and opened it up for the reception. Perfect for duel events. The shimmer is visible but subtle from a distance. Good material and the neck isnâ€™t too tight nor is the sheer part itchy. Great dress for formal events. Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Formal Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Formal Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sparkly Navy Blue, Sparkly Royal Blue, Sparkly Blush Pink, Sparkly Teal Blue and Black, Black Velvet, Dark Blue Velvet, Textured Black, Champagne Floral Lace, Light Green With Golden Stitching, Baby Blue Floral Lace, Solid Sage Green, Burgundy Velvet, Salmon Floral Lace, Sparkly Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
